meanings.definition: A person or thing that renews something.
meanings.sent1: The renewers fixed the old clock, making it work like new again.
meanings.sent2: The renewers planted fresh flowers in the garden to bring life back to the yard.
meanings.sent3: The renewers were like magical repairers, bringing back the sparkle to the worn-out items.
meanings.sent4: The renewers were like artists, painting vibrant colors on the dull canvas of the city.
meanings.sent5: The renewers were like superheroes, swooping in to save the day with their restoration powers.

meanings.definition: Those who renew or make something new again.
meanings.sent1: The renewers in the community organized a clean-up day to refresh the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The renewers at the workshop recycled old materials to create beautiful new crafts.
meanings.sent3: The renewers turned the boring party into a fun event with their creative ideas.
meanings.sent4: The renewers breathed new life into the old tradition, making it exciting for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The renewers transformed the dusty attic into a cozy space, perfect for relaxation.
